entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 93 %

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to drizzle this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6.
